This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0936 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
QST QuestionQuestionLimited to expected responses to questions by the fillerLimited to expected responses to questions by the filler
RSLT ResultResult
SCI Supporting Clinical InformationSupporting Clinical InformationPlacer observations not explicitly requested by the filler to provide context or supporting informationPlacer observations not explicitly requested by the filler to provide context or supporting information

name: ObservationType
title: observationType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying types of observations to enable systems to distinguish between observations sent along with an order, versus observations sent as the result to an order. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OBX segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0936 (Observation Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: Limited to expected responses to questions by the filler
